body:
Unfortunately

a) you did get banned somehow
b) the Google Groups interface makes fixing this close to impossible

We have 55,511 banned members at https://groups.google.com/forum/#!managemembers/golang-nuts/members/banned

But there's no search over them and I can only go through the list one page at a time. See https://productforums.google.com/forum/#!category-topic/Apps/LEt9s3tHecE for other people complaining about this.
